name: Fate/EXTELLA LINK
description: History, legend, and sci-fi collide in the latest chapter of the Fate/EXTRA saga! Join 26 Heroic Spirits from all across time as they hack and slash their way across the battlefields of SE.RA.PH, a digital realm for the last survivors of Earth.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5-760 @ 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 14 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11.0
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 @ 3.4 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 14 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11.0
